content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Copper Mining and Smelting Setup at (-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Stone furnace at (-27.0, -59.0)
- Burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5)
- Wooden chest at (-26.5, -57.5)

###Iron Mining and Smelting Setup at (1, -60)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (1.0, -60.0)
- Stone furnace at (2.0, -56.0)
- Burner inserter at (1.5, -57.5)
- Wooden chest at (1.5, -58.5)

###Iron Smelting Array at (1, 1)
Consists of:
- Three stone furnaces at (1.0, 1.0), (3.0, 1.0), and (2.0, 7.0)
- Three burner inserters at (1.5, 2.5), (3.5, 2.5), (5.5, 2.5)
- Three wooden chests at (1.5, 3.5), (3.5, 3.5), (5.5, 3.5)

###Copper Cable Production Line at (14.5, 14.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (14.5, 14.5)
- Input chest at (14.5, 11.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 14.5)
- Burner inserters at (14.5, 12.5), (12.5, 14.5)

###Electronic Circuit Production Line at (21.5, 15.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (21.5, 15.5)
- Input chests at (17.5, 14.5), (21.5, 11.5)
- Output chest at (24.5, 15.5)
- Burner inserters at (19.5, 15.5), (23.5, 15.5)

###Power Generation Setup (Incomplete)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-7.5, 25.5)
- Boiler at (18.0, 47.5)
- Steam engine at (29.5, 51.5)
- Multiple pipe networks attempting to connect these components

ERROR TIPS

###Water Pipeline Connection Errors
- When connecting water pipes between entities, ensure there is a clear unobstructed path
- Check if the connection points of entities (boiler, offshore pump, steam engine) are properly aligned
- Remove any blocking entities in the path of the planned water connection

###Entity Power Issues
- Ensure power generating structures (steam engine) are properly connected to power consumers
- Complete the water pipeline connections to get the power generation running
- Connect power poles to create a complete electrical network

###Production Line Issues
- Assembling machines need proper power connection to function
- Ensure input materials are available in the input chests
- Verify inserter placement and orientation for proper material flow

###Resource Management
- Keep burner entities fueled to maintain operation
- Monitor chest capacities to prevent overflow or bottlenecks
- Ensure proper input/output ratios for efficient production
